name: Pire(กองฟืน) - pradit-saengkrai(thailand)
description:
nomadelabel brings an original composition from this wonderful composer. "Hi, i'm a Thai tradition musician who fall in love with the sound and algorithmic composition. My material is from all around myself such as Thai music instruments, soundscape, mathematics and programming. Hope you enjoy my piece, thank you." - Pradit Saengkrai

"i'v met Pradit in bangkok, 2012. Was in Gallery Ver 7th April, that we'v play a improvised set. it was good to receive this .wav file by wetransfer. It's a kind of virtual Piphat music, as devaju..." blusimonwasem
For this mint, it was necessary techniques of compression and spectrum expansion, for greater depth and definition in the .mp3 format.

buyers who want to request the original version, sent by the artist, contact the twitter account @nomadelabel 

composer's page:
https://soundcloud.com/pradit-saengkrai
Memories of BKK 2012
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=8KLLKCrKYoM
Complementary piece will be posted at https://ssw.wtf/blusw 
(Polygon-Matic nfts)

ขอบคุณสำหรับช่วงเวลาที่สวยงาม
